trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Gila Bend
There were no other sightings in Gila Bend on or around August 15th 1980
divs: Sighting Detailsit was a bright intense light from an area in the arizona desert on the gunery ranges outside of Luke AFB. I was a Security Policeman stationed at Luke, we were assigned to protect the gun ranges outside of Gila Bend south to the Mexican border. We were so far removed from civilization and any highways that it could not have been a vehicle and it was not a conventional aircraft. The light was at near ground level, shinned at us for about a minute and then shot up into the air and then vanished.
